answers.answer: Hello,I can understand how much trouble you are in.But for helping you out I need answers to few queries.1) What is your age?2) Do you have any concurrent illness like diabetes, enlarged prostate, any infection of your genitals?3) Have you undergone any tests like USG of abdomen and pelvis region or urodynamic studies?May be if I have the following answers I might be of some more help to you.Regards.

question: there is pain at the base of the penis, and urination is painful.  What could it be?
title: painful urination
